Articles.Content:
Are there any mods that would let me add custom decals/graphics/symbols in 1.1.3 ?

I found a plenty of mods that do this but the most recent I found was for KSP 1.0.3, that is before Unity upgrade, so it's rather dubious it would still work. Anything "current" out there?
Mod question moved to the mod subforum.

They do not directly access the game, but the game accesses the decals, so no matter the version, they will work.

Mine (the RNZAF Kiwi) is from .90 but still works on 1.1.3

 

If you wanted to add your own, just drop it into the folder provided you use the dimensions of the existing ones and the format... (png I think)

Edited August 7, 2016 by kiwi1960

1 hour ago, kiwi1960 said:

If you wanted to add your own, just drop it into the folder provided you use the dimensions of the existing ones and the format... (png I think)

That would be logos on flags and on some parts in predefined places - replacing pre-made logos with own, right?

I'm interested in making a big decal on the side of MK3 cargo bay, where there was none before. There were mods where decals could be added as custom surface-mounted parts, or you could customize any part with "add decal" etc.
Oh, OK, well, then I cannot help, good luck anyhow.

There is also

And if you missed it in the thread

hope it helped
